# Adding mouse_id to the metadata

```{r}

# load data
brain <- readRDS(file.path(data_dir,"objects", "brain_objects", 
                           "2025_01_22_brain_v1.7_region.labels_added.RDS"))

```

Need to add mouse_id to account for the fact that the anterior and posterior slices come from the same mice n=8 not 16
```{r}
# extract meta
meta <- brain@meta.data

# create mouse_id
meta$mouse_id <- paste0(meta$mouse_group, meta$brain_slice)

# replace metadata in brain 
brain <- AddMetaData(brain, meta)

```
Save the object 
```{r}
# save the object
saveRDS(brain, file.path(data_dir,"objects", "brain_objects", 
                           "2025_01_22_brain_v1.7_added_mouse_id.RDS"))
```
